# 28/30 lunar mansions 𓉔 𓉧 Manazilu ʾl-Qamar

28 ≈ Sidereal month 27 d 7 h 43 min
30 ≈ Synodic month 29 d 12 h 44 min

lunar mansions

28 Zodiacs
28 ≈ 二十八宿 Èrshíbā Xiù

30 = 3 x 10 three deccans vs
28 = 3 x 9 + 1 pseudo decimal system of the Ennead
28 = 4 x 7 weeks of seven days:

𓊏 𓊪 𓇹 | one seventh (of a cubit) | 1/7 sept ϣⲟⲡ ϣⲱⲡ 1/7=4/28 4-finger breadth "palm"

The Sidereal month was at times connected to a 3*9(+1) numbering scheme strongly connected with first millennium BC alphabets:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrillic_numerals

Value Greek Cyrillic
1 Α А
2 Β В
3 Γ Г
4 Δ Д
5 Ε Є or Е
6 Ϛ or Ϝ Ѕ or Ꙃ or Ꙅ
7 Ζ З or Ꙁ
8 Η И
9 Θ Ѳ

Value Greek Cyrillic
10 Ιʹ І or Ї
20 Κʹ К
30 Λʹ Л
40 Μʹ М
50 Νʹ Н
60 Ξʹ Ѯ or Ч†
70 Οʹ Ѻ or О
80 Πʹ П
90 Ϟʹ Ч or Ҁ

Value Greek Cyrillic
100 Ρʹ Р
200 Σʹ С
300 Τʹ Т
400 Υʹ У or Ѵ or ОУ or Ꙋ
500 Φʹ Ф
600 Χʹ Х
700 Ψʹ Ѱ
800 Ωʹ Ѡ or Ѿ or Ꙍ
900 Ϡʹ Ц or Ѧ

1000 was represented with an superscript iota ᶥΒ = 2000

Cyrillic modifying signs
1,000 ҂ Тысяча знак (Thousand mark)
10,000 ⃝ Тьма (Myriad)
100,000 ҈ Легион (Legion)
1,000,000 ҉ Леодр (Leodor, Legion of Legions)
10,000,000 ꙰ Вран ( Ворон) Raven
100,000,000 ꙱ Колода (Trough/Log)
1,000,000,000 ꙲ слева Тьма тем (Many Myriad)

900 Ϡ 𓅨𓅨 𓅩𓅩 𓅪𓅪 𓅫𓅫 𓅱𓅱 𓅳 swallows / sparrows?

The Greek alphabet and number system is almost related to the first rod except for the extra entry 𓁹𓌴𓈖𓏏𓆑 between 90 and 100. This is a general problem: we have 27 numbers but 28 days! The second rod is from a side branch in the development of the alphabet dissimilar to greek. The first sifted letters might be explainable, the 𓅝 𓅮 part much less so.

4 Δ 𓏌𓏏𓇯 fourthal 𓏏! < 𐌀𐌉𐌈𐌕𐌓𐌀 < protheus!

There is no clear connection to
3 * 9 = 27 Zodiacs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nakshatra

Halaham

The 28 cubit on old Egyptian measuring rods were previously assumed to represent or connect to some form of ancient Alphabet.

It is weakly compatible with the 𓀠 𓏲 𓇓 𓈖 Harashamun form of the Halaham :

h r š m q w ś/ṯ r b/ø t ḏ/ø š/s 𓇳 𓆄 𓏘 𓅭 𓏌𓏏𓇯 𓊨𓁹 𓊨𓏏 𓃫 𓉠

𓇳 hara / הra 𓆄 šum 𓏘 qw 𓅭 bat / sa 𓏌𓏏𓇯 ṯ'air 𓊨𓁹 voir 𓊨𓏏 t 𓃫 ḏ … š 𓉠
